// src/FirstStep.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../styles/FirstStep.css' function FirstStep() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', age: { day: '', month: '', year: '' }, isSubmittingOnBehalf: false, hasDisability: '', disabilityFile: null, }); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value, type, checked } = e.target; if (type === 'checkbox') { setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: checked }); } else if (name.includes('age')) { const field = name.split('.')[1]; // Example: age.day setFormData({ ...formData, age: { ...formData.age, [field]: value }, }); } else { setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); } }; const handleFileChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, disabilityFile: e.target.files[0] }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); // Handle form submission here }; return (
  • 1
